creator: wjrola@gmail.com
text:
I apologize first that i have a poor English,so maybe I can not clearly express what I mean.

When browse Tomcat Web Application Manager (http://localhost:8080/manager/html),I get ERROR 404 page sometime.When it happened,I find that the web.xml in /apache-tomcat/webapps/manager/WEB-INF is disappeared. Because I am beginner of java,so I can only tell you what happened but can not know why.

the version that I have found that problem:
7.0.62  7.0.63  8.0.24

I hope what I find can help us fixed issue.

I will repeat this letter in my mother tongue(Chinese),it can make you more clearly understood it if you can read it.
因为我的英语不好，所以可能不能用英语准确的描述我想表达的意思，首先表达我的歉意。

当我使用 Tomcat Web Application Manager (http://localhost:8080/manager/html)时，我发现有时会返回404错误页面，当上述错误发生时，我发现 /apache-tomcat/webapps/manager/WEB-INF里边的web.xml文件消失了。因为我是一个java的初学者，因此我只能向您反映问题的现象，但是不能准确的反映为什么会出现这种现象。

我在使用过程中发现过问题的版本如下：
7.0.62  7.0.63  8.0.24

我希望我的发现能帮助修复这个问题。

我将会用母语（汉语）再将信的内容重复一遍，如果您能理解汉语将会帮助您更好的理解我说的问题

creator: markt@apache.org
text: Bugzilla is not a support forum. Please use the Tomcat users mailing list.
